dialogueLines.line: Oh... hello, dear. I suppose you must be Strawberry, the Grim Reaper's new helper. Quite a peculiar name, if you ask me.
It’s memorable, right? You can call me 'Berry' if you like. What can I get for you today?
I’m not sure, to be honest. I suppose I’d like something to... take the edge off this heaviness in my heart. It’s been so long since I felt... warmth.
